sentence: pic.twitter.com/Vu8Nntz9r6 — Governor Mike DeWine (@GovMikeDeWine) February 26, 2022 DeWine said he plans to visit Northeast Ohio on Sunday to "stand in solidarity with Ohio's Ukrainian community."
author: Drew Scofield
title: Gov. Mike DeWine declares Sunday statewide 'Day of Prayer' for Ukraine; will visit Parma church to show support

sentence: PARMA, Ohio — Following Russia’s unprovoked invasion of Ukraine, Ohio Governor Mike DeWine announced the Ohio Department of Job and Family Services will convene a summit of area organizations to help prepare for Ukrainian refugees who resettle in Ohio.
author: Clay LePard
title: Gov. DeWine to host summit to prepare for Ukrainian refugees coming to Ohio

author: Kaylyn Hlavaty
title: Groups from around state attend summit in Parma to prepare for possibility of Ukrainian refugees

author: ANDREW WELSH-HUGGINS - Associated Press
title: Ohio collecting surplus helmets, vests for Ukraine defense
